Senate confirms Jeanine Pirro as U.S. Attorney for the District of Columbia  —  Washington - The Senate on Saturday approved the nomination of Jeanine Pirro, an ardent loyalist of President Trump and a FOX News fixture, confirming the cable news personality to a top prosecutor post in Washington, D.C.

Senate confirms former Fox News host Pirro as top federal prosecutor for the nation's capital  —  The Senate has confirmed former Fox News host Jeanine Pirro as the top federal prosecutor for the nation's capital, filling the post after President Donald Trump withdrew his controversial first pick, conservative activist Ed Martin Jr.

Senate Confirms Election Denying Fox Host as DC US Attorney  —  Senate Republicans were undeterred by former Fox News host Jeanine Pirro's election denialism.  They confirmed her nomination to be U.S. Attorney for the District of Columbia on Saturday night by a 50-45 vote.
